data.enText: rougher
roughest
not smooth

data.chText: 粗糙的；不平滑的；高低不平的
data.enText: having a surface that is not even or regular
rough ground

data.chText: 她手上的皮肤粗糙而没有弹性。
data.enText: The skin on her hands was hard and rough.

data.chText: 用锋利的刀将参差不齐的边切齐。
data.enText: Trim rough edges with a sharp knife.
not exact

data.chText: 不确切的；粗略的；大致的
data.enText: not exact; not including all details

data.chText: 对成本的粗略计算 / 估计
data.enText: a rough calculation/estimate of the cost

data.chText: 我大致知道我想去哪里了。
data.enText: I've got a rough idea of where I want to go.
There were about 20 people there, at a rough guess .
a rough draft of a speech
a rough sketch
violent
not gentle or careful; violent

data.chText: 这块手表不可重拿重放。
data.enText: This watch is not designed for rough treatment.

data.chText: 他们投诉警卫对他们动粗了。
data.enText: They complained of rough handling by the guards.
rough kids
Don't try any rough stuff with me!

data.chText: 犯罪盛行的；充斥暴力的；危险的
data.enText: where there is a lot of violence or crime
the roughest neighbourhood in the city
sea
having large and dangerous waves

data.chText: 那天夜里风浪太大，无法行船。
data.enText: It was too rough to sail that night.
weather
wild and with storms
difficult

data.chText: 艰难的；讨厌的；令人不快的
data.enText: difficult and unpleasant
He's had a really rough time recently (= he's had a lot of problems) .

data.chText: 我们会找个人来干这重活。
data.enText: We'll get someone in to do the rough work (= the hard physical work) .
not well
not feeling well

data.chText: 你看上去不太舒服——没事吧？
data.enText: You look rough─are you OK?
I had a rough night (= I didn't sleep well) .
plain/basic

data.chText: 粗糙的；不够精细的；朴实简单的
data.enText: simply made and not finished in every detail; plain or basic
rough wooden tables
a rough track
rough paper for making notes on
not smooth

data.chText: 味道差的；涩的；刺耳的；令人难受的
data.enText: not smooth or pleasant to taste, listen to, etc.

data.chText: 口感极差的葡萄酒；刺耳的声音
data.enText: a rough wine/voice
rough edges
small parts of sth or of a person's character that are not yet as good as they should be

data.chText: 这段芭蕾舞还有不足之处。
data.enText: The ballet still had some rough edges.

data.chText: 他在学校改掉了一些坏毛病。
data.enText: He had a few rough edges knocked off at school.
the rough end of the pineapple

data.chText: 受到不良（或不公平）对待的处境
data.enText: a situation in which sb is treated badly or unfairly
a rough deal
the fact of being treated unfairly

data.id-g-sent: have/give sb a rough/an easy ride

data.enText: in golf
the part of a golf course where the grass is long, making it more difficult to hit the ball
drawing/design
the first version of a drawing or design that has been done quickly and without much detail
violent person
a violent person
a gang of roughs
in rough
if you write or draw sth in rough , you make a first version of it, not worrying too much about mistakes or details
take the rough with the smooth

data.chText: 好事坏事都接受；既能享乐也能吃苦
data.enText: to accept the unpleasant or difficult things that happen in life as well as the good things
a bit of rough

data.chText: （与社会地位较高者有性关系的）有魅力的粗人
data.enText: a person of a low social class who has a sexual relationship with sb of a higher class
rough it

data.chText: 暂时过艰苦的生活；渡过暂时的难关
data.enText: to live in a way that is not very comfortable for a short time

data.chText: 我们可以睡在海滩上。我不在乎吃一两夜的苦。
data.enText: We can sleep on the beach. I don't mind roughing it for a night or two.
rough sth↔out
to draw or write sth without including all the details
I've roughed out a few ideas.
rough sb↔up
to hurt sb by hitting or kicking them

data.chText: 他声称看守们在监狱里殴打了他。
data.enText: He claimed that guards had roughed him up in prison.
using force or violence

data.chText: 他们比赛总是这么粗野吗？
data.enText: Do they always play this rough?
live/sleep rough

data.chText: 风餐露宿（通常因为无家可归或贫穷）
data.enText: to live or sleep outdoors, usually because you have no home and no money
young people sleeping rough on the streets

word_means: 粗暴地对待;使粗糙;草拟

means: 粗暴地对待;使粗糙;草拟

ex.chText: 为什么这张粗糙的木桌如此昂贵？
ex.enText: Why was this rough wooden table so expensive?

ex.chText: 皮肤粗糙是困扰很多人的常见问题。
ex.enText: Rough skin is a very common problem affecting many people.

synonyms.bx: 指制作不够精细的，或表面不平滑的。

ex.chText: 她粗糙的双手是常年艰辛劳作的结果。
ex.enText: Her coarse hands are the result of years of hard work.

ex.chText: 他新买的粗羊毛夹克衫不保暖。
ex.enText: His new jacket of coarse wool failed to keep him warm.

ex.chText: 如果你想做出美味的蛋糕，那么不要用粗盐。
ex.enText: Coarse salt shouldn't be used if you want to make tasty cakes.

synonyms.bx: 指皮肤或布料不光滑的，也指构成部分粗大的。

ex.chText: 尽管工艺粗糙，这款花瓶销量很好。
ex.enText: In spite of its crude workmanship, this type of vase sells well.

ex.chText: 他只能描画出窃贼脸部的大致轮廓。
ex.enText: He can only provide a crude drawing of the thief's face.

synonyms.bx: 指制作水平不高、细节欠雕琢打磨的。

ex.chText: 真的有人能够在那件简陋的小木屋里生活一年吗？
ex.enText: Is there anyone who can really live in that rude wooden hut for one year?

synonyms.bx: 指房屋简陋的，或设施不完备的。

ex.chText: 他讲话的声音有点沙哑。
ex.enText: He speaks with a bit of hoarse voice.

synonyms.bx: 指声音嘶哑刺耳的，通常因嗓子疼或大声喊叫后嗓子失音所致。

ex.chText: 马达的声音不正常，最好检查一下。
ex.enText: The motor sounds rough - better get it checked.

synonyms.bx: 指声音粗糙不悦耳的，也指机器出故障时发出的声音很难听的。

data.enText: rough edges
small parts of sth or of a person's character that are not yet as good as they should be

data.chText: 这段芭蕾舞还有不足之处。
data.enText: The ballet still had some rough edges.

data.chText: 他在学校改掉了一些坏毛病。
data.enText: He had a few rough edges knocked off at school.
the rough end of the pineapple

data.chText: 受到不良（或不公平）对待的处境
data.enText: a situation in which sb is treated badly or unfairly
a rough deal
the fact of being treated unfairly
have a rough/an easy ride
give sb a rough/an easy ride
to experience/not experience difficulties when you are doing sth; to make things difficult/easy for sb

data.chText: 在党员大会上他会很难过这一关。
data.enText: He will be given a rough ride at the party conference.
in rough
if you write or draw sth in rough , you make a first version of it, not worrying too much about mistakes or details
take the rough with the smooth

data.chText: 好事坏事都接受；既能享乐也能吃苦
data.enText: to accept the unpleasant or difficult things that happen in life as well as the good things
a bit of rough

data.chText: （与社会地位较高者有性关系的）有魅力的粗人
data.enText: a person of a low social class who has a sexual relationship with sb of a higher class
rough it

data.chText: 暂时过艰苦的生活；渡过暂时的难关
data.enText: to live in a way that is not very comfortable for a short time

data.chText: 我们可以睡在海滩上。我不在乎吃一两夜的苦。
data.enText: We can sleep on the beach. I don't mind roughing it for a night or two.
live/sleep rough

data.chText: 风餐露宿（通常因为无家可归或贫穷）
data.enText: to live or sleep outdoors, usually because you have no home and no money
young people sleeping rough on the streets
rough sth↔out
to draw or write sth without including all the details
I've roughed out a few ideas.
rough sb↔up
to hurt sb by hitting or kicking them

data.chText: 他声称看守们在监狱里殴打了他。
data.enText: He claimed that guards had roughed him up in prison.

tr: the part of a golf course bordering the fairway where the grass is not cut short
prepare in preliminary or sketchy form
ready and able to resort to force or violence
example: pugnacious spirits...lamented that there was so little prospect of an exhilarating disturbance"- Herman Melvill
they were rough and determined fighting men

tr: unpleasantly harsh or grating in sound

example: the fierce thunders roar me their music"- Ezra Poun

tr: not shaped by cutting or trimming

example: they were having a rough time
a harsh and unlovable old tyrant
wild and harsh country full of hot sand and cactus
the nomad life is rough and hazardous

tr: (of persons or behavior) lacking refinement or finesse
example: she was a diamond in the rough
managed to make a crude splint
a crude cabin of logs with bark still on them

tr: having or caused by an irregular surface
causing or characterized by jolts and irregular movements
of the margin of a leaf shape
having the edge cut or fringed or scalloped
with rough motion as over a rough surface
with roughness or violence (`rough' is an informal variant for `roughly')

value.def: If a surface is rough, it is uneven and not smooth.

example.ex: His hands were rough and calloused, from years of karate practice...
example.tran: 由于多年练习空手道，他的双手粗糙不平，布满老茧。

example.ex: Grace made her way slowly across the rough ground.
example.tran: 格雷斯缓慢地走过高低不平的地面。

example.ex: She rested her cheek against the roughness of his jacket.
example.tran: 她把脸颊靠在他粗糙的夹克上。

value.def: You say that people or their actions are rough when they use too much force and not enough care or gentleness.

example.ex: Rugby's a rough game at the best of times...
example.tran: 即使是在比赛最不激烈的时候，橄榄球也是一种粗野的运动。

example.ex: They have complained of discrimination and occasional rough treatment.
example.tran: 他们抗议遭受歧视，而且偶尔还会遭到粗暴的对待。

value.tran: (人或行为)粗暴的，粗野的，粗鲁的

example.ex: A hand roughly pushed him aside.
example.tran: 一只手粗鲁地把他推到了一边。

example.ex: He regretted his roughness.
example.tran: 他对自己的粗鲁感到后悔。

value.def: A rough area, city, school, or other place is unpleasant and dangerous because there is a lot of violence or crime there.

example.ex: It was quite a rough part of our town.
example.tran: 这是我们城里犯罪率很高的地区。

value.tran: (地区、城市、学校等)危险的，充斥暴力的，犯罪率高的

value.def: If you say that someone has had a rough time, you mean that they have had some difficult or unpleasant experiences.

example.ex: All women have a rough time in our society...
example.tran: 在我们的社会中，所有女性的日子都不好过。

example.ex: Tomorrow, he knew, would be a rough day.
example.tran: 他知道明天将会是艰难的一天。

value.tran: (日子)艰难的，困难的，不愉快的

value.def: If you feel rough, you feel ill.

example.ex: The virus won't go away and the lad is still feeling a bit rough.
example.tran: 病毒无法清除，这个小伙子仍然觉得有点不舒服。

value.def: A rough calculation or guess is approximately correct, but not exact.

example.ex: We were only able to make a rough estimate of how much fuel would be required...
example.tran: 我们只能对所需燃料作一个粗略的估计。

example.ex: As a rough guide, a horse needs 2.5 per cent of his body weight in food every day.
example.tran: 作为一个大致的参照，一匹马每天需要吃相当于其体重2.5％的食物。

value.tran: (计算、猜测)大概的，粗略的，不精确的

example.ex: Gambling and tourism pay roughly half the entire state budget...
example.tran: 博彩业和旅游业支撑着整个国家约一半的财政预算。

example.ex: The Ukraine is roughly equal to France in size and population.
example.tran: 乌克兰的面积和人口与法国大致相当。

example.ex: ...a period of very roughly 30 million years.
example.tran: 非常粗略地算作3,000万年的一段时间

value.def: If you give someone a rough idea, description, or drawing of something, you indicate only the most important features, without much detail.

example.ex: I've got a rough idea of what he looks like...
example.tran: 我已经大致知道他长什么样子了。

example.ex: It often helps to make a rough sketch showing where the vehicles were.
example.tran: 画一个简略的草图标示车辆当时所在的位置往往很有用。

value.tran: (想法、描述)粗略的，简略的，大致的;(图画)简笔的

example.ex: He knew roughly what was about to be said...
example.tran: 他大概知道要说些什么。

example.ex: Roughly speaking, a scientific humanist is somebody who believes in science and in humanity but not in God.
example.tran: 简单来讲，科学人道主义者是相信科学和人道主义而不相信上帝的人。

value.def: You can say that something is rough when it is not neat and well made.

example.ex: ...a rough wooden table.
example.tran: 做工粗糙的木桌子

example.ex: ...chairs set in a rough circle in the middle of the room.
example.tran: 房间中央大致围成一圈的椅子

value.tran: 做工粗糙的;不精致的;简陋的

example.ex: Roughly chop the tomatoes and add them to the casserole.
example.tran: 把西红柿大致切一切，然后放到炖锅里。

example.ex: ...houses, roughly painted white or blue.
example.tran: 简单刷成白色或蓝色的房子

value.def: If the sea or the weather at sea is rough, the weather is windy or stormy and there are very big waves.

example.ex: A fishing vessel and a cargo ship collided in rough seas.
example.tran: 一艘捕鱼船和一艘货船在波涛汹涌的海上相撞了。

value.tran: (天气)恶劣的，狂风暴雨的;(海面)波浪滔天的

value.def: When people sleep or live rough, they sleep out of doors, usually because they have no home.

example.ex: It makes me so sad when I see young people begging or sleeping rough on the streets.
example.tran: 我看到年轻人沿街乞讨、露宿街头，心里会非常难过。

value.tran: 风餐露宿地;无家可归地;流浪地

value.def: If you have to rough it, you have to live without the possessions and comforts that you normally have.

example.ex: You won't be roughing it; each room comes equipped with a telephone and a 3-channel radio.
example.tran: 你不会过得太艰苦;每个房间都配备了一部电话和一台可以接收3个频道的收音机。

value.tran: 过（从前没有过的）艰苦的生活

trans: 粗略的；粗略地；作为草稿

汹涌的大海；波涛汹涌的大海；大浪；风大浪急的海面；狂暴的大海

生气
粗糙型内质网；内质网；粗面内质网；粗糙内质网；糙面内质网
旺福氏；粗野；强壮的；粗野的, 粗暴的
露宿
粗糙纸；糙面纸；粗纸
